#summary &dagger; character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesD

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &dagger;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Dagger;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2021/index.htm U+02021].
  * `&dagger;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2020/index.htm U+02020].
